p: Mercury is taken with Piper betel L. (Nagavalli svarasa, 50 ml), Zingiber officinalae (Ardraka svarasa, 50 ml), and Trikshara (Yavakshara, Sarjika kshara and Tankana kshara, each of 50 g) in a clean Khalva Yantra. The above-said materials are rubbed in Khalva Yantra for eight hours per day for three days. The obtained material is washed and poured out with the help of lukewarm water several times until we get the pure mercury [ 57].
